H0.text: Whose 1960 recording “The Twist” spawned a craze for the dance of that name. Elvis Presley

H1.text: Whose 1960 recording “The Twist” spawned a craze for the dance of that name. Ray Charles

H2.text: Whose 1960 recording “The Twist” spawned a craze for the dance of that name. Little Richard

H3.text: Whose 1960 recording “The Twist” spawned a craze for the dance of that name. Chubby Checker

A4.text: Chubby Checker is known for popularizing many dance styles, including the Twist, with his 1960 hit cover of Hank Ballard & The Midnighters' R&B song 'The Twist'.

A5.text: The Twist went on to top the Billboard Hot 100 not just once in 1960, but yet again in a separate chart run in late 1961.
